version_description:
- Configura tu país de origen para usar los servicios y el idioma correspondientes (disponible en español, inglés y portugués)
- Ahora podrás ingresar a tu cuenta desde el primer momento que abras la aplicación, para que aproveches al máximo nuestras funcionalidades
- Pulimos nuestras pistas para que todos los servicios de la App aterricen de manera estable y sin fallas

- Pulimos nuestra pistas para que todos los servicios de la App aterricen de forma estable y sin fallas
- Mejoras en la experiencia

Capitán, queremos entregarle nueva información:

- Las condiciones están listas para que su Check-in esté visible en todo momento
- Estamos preparados para que nuestros pasajeros con iPhone X suban a bordo
- También podrán embarcar aquellos que tengan vuelos con nuestras aerolíneas asociadas
- Podrá revisar el Estado de sus vuelos cuando lo necesite

Attention, LATAM App passengers, we want to bring you some news:

- Our LATAM Pass KMS. are now LATAM Pass .Miles and you can see them in your statement of account
- We polished the lanes so that all the services land in a more stable way without failures
- Enhancements on user experience

Attention, LATAM App passengers, we want to bring you some news:

- We polished the lanes so that all the services land in a more stable way without failures
- Enhancements on user experience

What's new in this release:

- Completed flights won't be shown anymore in your list of upcoming trips.
- We made improvements to our flight status search system
- General improvements to your user experience

What’s new in this release:

- You don´t need to wait any longer; start traveling now! Book your tickets through our App.
- You can now view your priority boarding information directly on your Boarding Pass.
- We resolved errors that stopped some passengers from adding their reservations in our App.
- General improvements in experience and service stability for all our passengers.

What’s new in this release:

- Booking is now available for Argentina! We also made improvements in the booking experience for all our passengers.
- General improvements in service stability for all our passengers.

Novedades que traemos en esta versión:

- Desde ahora puedes compartir tu Tarjeta de embarque. Descárgala directamente en tu teléfono o envíala a quien quieras.
- Agrega tu Tarjeta de socio en el Wallet para disfrutar de todos los beneficios.
- Mejoras generales de experiencia y estabilidad de los servicios para todos nuestros pasajeros.

Novedades que traemos en esta versión:

- Agregamos un breve recorrido para nuevos usuarios con las principales funciones de nuestra App.
- Mejoras generales de experiencia y estabilidad de los servicios.

Novedades que traemos en esta versión:

- Corregimos errores que nos permiten dar mayor estabilidad a nuestros servicios.
- Mejoras generales de experiencia.

Novedades que traemos en esta versión:

- Desde ahora nuestros pasajeros con vuelos domésticos podrán adelantar o postergar su vuelo dentro del mismo día de acuerdo a su tarifa.
- Mejoras de experiencia generales.
- Corregimos errores que nos permiten dar mayor estabilidad a nuestros servicios.

Novedades que traemos en esta versión:

- Arreglamos un bug que no permitía a nuestros usuarios agregar su tarjeta de socio al Wallet
- Mejoras de experiencia en Check-in y Centro de Ayuda
- Mejoras generales y corrección de errores para dar mayor estabilidad a nuestros servicios.

Novedades que traemos en esta versión:

- Mejoras de experiencia y corrección de errores para dar mayor estabilidad a nuestros servicios.

Novedades que traemos en esta versión:

- ¡Prueba la realidad aumentada! Si tu dispositivo es compatible podrás disfrutar de una nueva experiencia para saber si puedes llevar tu equipaje de mano en la cabina del avión.
- Corregimos un error que no permitía a todos nuestros pasajeros iniciar sesión.

What's new in this release:

- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

- We fixed an error that caused a crash when opening the App after our last update
- We improved the overall performance of our login

What's new in this release:

- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- We improved our push notifications to inform you when your Check-in is available.
- General adjustments of experience and stability of our services.

What's new in this release:

- We redesigned and improved the experience of your account statement.
- General experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

- You can now add your Frequent Flyer Number in Check-in to earn points or miles with your trip.
- We fixed a bug that deleted added trips when the App was updated to the latest version.
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- You can now see the luggage you can take on your flight
- Adjustments and improvements to the Check-in experience
- Corrections and general improvements

What's new in this release:

- Adjustments and improvements to the Check-in experience
- Corrections and general improvements

What's new in this release:

- Corrections and general improvements

What's new in this release:

- Adjustments and improvements in our Check-in experience
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- You can now check the status of your request, claim or suggestion through our Help Center.
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- A new experience in your Account statement.
- Improvements in our Check-in experience for trips with babies.
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- A new boarding pass if a passenger travels on a direct flight.

- An accessible experience in loading the application, the start page and the page to add a trip.

- Corrections and general improvements.
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- We'll send a push notification before your flight to remind you to check your boarding group.
- We integrated the Basic Economy fare baggage information.
- We added a warning message for the temporary closure of Santos Dumont airport, in Rio de Janeiro.
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- We'll send a push notification before your flight to remind you to check your boarding group.
- We integrated the Basic Economy fare baggage information.
- We added a warning message for the temporary closure of Santos Dumont airport, in Rio de Janeiro.
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.
- We fixed a bug that prevented using the main menu after accessing the add trip option.

- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- Improvements in our same day flight change experience.
- Error fixes for a greater service stability.

- Improvements in our same day flight change experience.
- We fixed the error that caused "My Account" to not load correctly.
- Error fixes for a greater service stability.

What's new in this release:

- We extended our flight change period to 24 hours before the original departure time.
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.

- From now on we have a LATAM Pass section: access your LATAM Pass account to see your miles and member information or register as a new member.
- Error fixes for a greater service stability.
From now on you can change the date of your flight through our App. Go to More in our menu and change your flights if you need it.

What's new in this release:

- We fixed the error that didn't allow passengers to add trips with the + button
- Experience improvements and error fixes for a greater service stability.
- Experience improvements and error fixes.

- From now on, you will be able to share your boarding pass via Whatsapp, e-mail, SMS and more.
